name: plex
description: Plex(https://plex.tv) organizes video, music and photos from personal media libraries and streams them to smart TVs, streaming boxes and mobile devices. This container is packaged as a standalone Plex Media Server. Straightforward design and bulk actions mean getting things done faster.

paths.name: Appdata
paths.description: Plex library location. *This can grow very large, 50gb+ is likely for a large collection.*

paths.name: Path: /tv
paths.description: Media goes here. Add as many as needed e.g. `/movies`, `/tv`, etc.

paths.name: Path: /movies
paths.description: Media goes here. Add as many as needed e.g. `/movies`, `/tv`, etc.

variables.name: VERSION
variables.description: Set whether to update plex or not - see Application Setup section.

variables.name: PLEX_CLAIM
variables.description: Optionally you can obtain a claim token from https://plex.tv/claim and input here. Keep in mind that the claim tokens expire within 4 minutes.
